description: '''Oscar Sibonginkosi Mdlongwa''' (born 29 November 1967) is a South African recording artist, DJ, record producer and businessman. Having been in the music industry for over 26 years, Oskido has reached a prominent status in the South African music industry, more-so in popular youth culture. He is undoubtedly one of the pioneering artists that popularised the [[Kwaito]] genre of music outside of the [[Township (South Africa)|townships]] of South Africa, and he's been central to the rise of [[Afro house|Afro-house]] and opened doors for the new genre known as [[amapiano]]. Oskido is the co-founder of Kalawa Jazmee Records (formerly Kalawa Records), a record label that is home to musical acts like [[Mafikizolo]], [[Bongo Maffin]], and many other foremost groups.
